welcomeIntro:
Welcome to our portal! 
In order to use your account you need to verify your email. Click on the following link.
welcomeOutro: Link is valid for 10 minutes. If it expired and you need a new link, visit localhost:3000/newVerification .
passResetIntro: We have recived a request to reset your account password. If you didn't request it, ignore this email. If you did, follow the link.
